predicate.note: Frames file for 'cede' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

roleset.name: give graciously

example.name: pretty simple, really
example.text: Both Coors and Stroh have recently been ceding market share to Miller and Anheuser.

roleset.note: To my ear, this cannot take the double object construction (*"John ceded Mary his dessert.")
